attributes.action: Reveal the truth about the British Security Services' involvement in carrying out false flag terrorist atrocities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British security services create the climate of fear necessary to implement the New World Order global fascist state by employing muslim patsies to plant bombs in order to foster fear and helplessness amongst the UK population so that the people will accept draconian laws and loss of liberty.  I challenge the PM to come clean about the shadowy operations of the SIS so that we can be clear what he means when he calls for a New World Order.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
